attributes.action: only allow propery developers to purchase properties after being on the market for 6 months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most houses that are being built new or being sold seem to sell quickly and don't give people who intend to live in these properties no chance of buying them. Then these properties go up for rent and stay empty for a long time. I believe that developers should only be able to purchase properties when they have been on the market for at least 6 months.
